title: 283: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: The Men Tell All + A Heartbreaking Exit
itunes:title: 283: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: The Men Tell All + A Heartbreaking Exit
description:
The Broads chat about the messy Men Tell All but first they discuss some theories about Hometowns/Fantasy Suites, their current thoughts on Katie, their hopes and dreams for Michael A, and a whole lot more!
